name: The Protector (Mehrdad Dehdashti)
description:
You're in a barely functional mech with limited wires and systems. You need to salvage the wires you have to operate the systems. You control the mech by transmitting power through control modules that connect to the mech's remaining functional systems.

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018

Art: Mohannad Al-Khatib
Code: Mehrdad Dehdashti
Sound: Beatrix Moersch
